articles.description: Marcus Stoinis gets a golden duck, and it's all downhill from there for Ricky Ponting's Delhi Capitals, who lose the IPL final to the Mumbai Indians.
articles.content: Defending champions the Mumbai Indians have claimed their fifth Indian Premier League title after romping to a five-wicket victory over the Delhi Capitals, coached by Ricky Ponting, in the final in D… [+2516 chars]

articles.title: NSW was its own worst enemy in the Origin opener. The signs are already better for Game II - Fox Sports
articles.description: You know how this goes: The NSW Blues must beat the QLD Maroons in Game 2 or the 2020 State of Origin series is over.
articles.content:
The second game, at ANZ Stadium in Sydney on Wednesday night, is a win-or-go-home test for Brad Fittlers Blues.
But there is some good news the conditions look perfect.

articles.description: After being written off by all and sundry leading into game one, the Maroons now head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the series following an upset.
articles.content:
After being written off by all and sundry going into game one, the Maroons head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the Ampol State of Origin series.
